Pattern Library

card component

< back to style guide

PROPS:
  • category (optional)
  • title (optional)
  • content (optional)
  • link (optional)
  • :tags - array of objects [{name, link}] (optional)
  • video - url to vimeo or youtube iframe (optional)
  • background - true or false (false by default)
